description: Why settle for just one ingredient when you can have three? The aged rum, curaçao and lime juice in this classic&nbsp;summertime highball not only taste great together but provide an excellent background flavor. Topping it off with&nbsp;ginger beer does the trick every time!
keywords: How to make Anejo Highball Cocktail Recipe
How to make Anejo Highball Cocktail
name: Añejo Highball
recipeIngredient: Lime wheel and orange slice for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: In a highball glass filled with ice, combine the rum, curaçao, lime juice, and bitters.
recipeInstructions.text: In a highball glass filled with ice, combine the rum, curaçao, lime juice, and bitters.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with the orange and lime. Serve and enjoy.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with the orange and lime. Serve and enjoy.
